typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.duui.ReproducibleAnnotation
typeDescription.description: ReproducibleAnnotation stores the information about a composer pipeline component in compressed form. The reproducibility mainly stems from the strict naming of docker containers.

featureDescription.name: timestamp
featureDescription.description: The timestamp at which this annotation was added, this is important for chronological ordering.

featureDescription.name: pipelineName
featureDescription.description: Stores the pipeline name, this can be a good way to later group the analysis engines from one pipeline run

featureDescription.name: description
featureDescription.description: Stores the actual information about the component, most of the time in compressed format with Base85 encoded.

featureDescription.name: compression
featureDescription.description: The compression used to compress the description, since the compression of the description happens at initialization time it is most of the time wise to use a compression method with a higher compression ratio.
